divs: Sighting Detailswas outside cleaning out pickup truck, walked to porch, blue light haze caught my eye, it was larger than airplane, low altitude,silent, had blue glowing aura. it connected with nothing familiar i'd ever seen before. it flew from over my house, the yard then straight over trees. it didn't scare me, i had no terrified feeling, the light was almost warm in nature.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Castor
There was one other sighting in Castor on or around October 15th 2012
Summary: made no sound. had blue-ish haze
